title: OMFG
body: <!-- id=304--><!-- isMature=1 -->if you're driving on a highway, 15mph below the posted limit, i don't care what the weather conditions are like, put your god damn hazard blinkers on!!!
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-01-18

OMFG

if you're driving on a highway, 15mph below the posted limit, i don't care what the weather conditions are like, put your god damn hazard blinkers on!!!
